Package org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.remotese.transport

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientNode
    Client type of TransportNode, connects to a ServerNode
    DtoHandler
    Component that process locally DTO
    DtoSender
    Components that sends a DTO over the network to the other end.
    RemoteMethodExecutor  
    RemoteMethodInvoker  
    RemoteMethodParser<T>  
    RemoteMethodTxCallback<T>  
    ServerNode
    Server type of a TransportNode, start and waits for clients to connectAReader
    TransportDto
    Message DTO with an embedded KeypleDto enriched with common layer information For instance, can embed web socket connection information
    TransportNode
    TransportNode is a one-point gateway for incoming and outgoing TransportDto.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KeypleDto
    Data Transfer Object used to common an API call from a Master Reader to a Slave Reader (and vice versa)
    KeypleDtoHelper
    Utility class to manipulate KeypleDto
    RemoteMethodTx<T>
    Abstract class to implement blocking and non blocking call to a Remote Method that sends a response
    RemoteMethodTxEngine
    Executor of RemoteMethodTx It manages : - send Dto - manage Dto Responses
    TransportFactory
    Factory for Clients and Servers sharing a protocol and a configuration to connectAReader each others
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RemoteMethod  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    KeypleRemoteException  
    KeypleRemoteReaderException
